16 class RobotStatusObserver(object):
17 
18  def __init__(self, robot_status_handler):
19  """
20 
21  :type robot_status_handler: RobotStatusHandler
22  """
23  self.__robot_status_handler = robot_status_handler
24 
25  self.out_of_bounds = False
26  self.hardware_status = HardwareStatus()
27  self.motion_goal_is_active = False
28  self.is_debug_motor_active = False
29  self.jog_is_enabled = False
30  self.program_is_running = False
31  self.program_error = False
32  self.program_error_message = ""
33  self.is_tcp_client_connected = False
34  self.learning_mode_state = False
35  self.joint_limits = None
36  self.pause_state = PausePlanExecution.STANDBY
37  self.collision_detected = False
38  self.rpi_overheating = False
39  self.learning_trajectory = False
40  self.estop_detected = False
41 
42  self.rpi_overheating_temperature = rospy.get_param(
43  "niryo_robot_hardware_interface/cpu_interface/temperature_warn_threshold", 75)
44 
45  # - Subscribers
46  self.hardware_status_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_status',
47  HardwareStatus,
48  self.__callback_hardware_status)
49 
50  self.__pause_state_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_rpi/pause_state',
51  PausePlanExecution,
52  self.__callback_pause)
53 
54  self.motion_goal_is_active_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/is_active',
55  Bool,
56  self.__callback_motion_goal_is_active)
57 
58  self.is_debug_motor_active_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/is_debug_motor_active',
59  Bool,
60  self.__callback_is_debug_motor_active)
61

63  Bool,
64  self.__callback_jog_is_enabled)
65 
66  self.program_is_running_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/execute_program/status',
67  GoalStatusArray,
68  self.__callback_program_is_running)
69

71  Bool,
72  self.__callback_is_client_connected)

80  self.__callback_collision_detected)

82  self.__joint_state_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/joint_states', JointState, self.__callback_joint_states)

85  Bool,

88  self.__estop_state_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_rpi/estop_status', Bool, self.__callback_estop_state)
89 
90  def __callback_estop_state(self, msg):
91  if self.estop_detected != msg.data:
92  self.estop_detected = msg.data
93  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
94 
95  def __callback_pause(self, msg):
96  if self.pause_state != msg.state:
97  self.pause_state = msg.state
98  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
99 
100  def __callback_motion_goal_is_active(self, msg):
101  if self.motion_goal_is_active != msg.data:
102  self.motion_goal_is_active = msg.data
103  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
104 
105  def __callback_is_debug_motor_active(self, msg):
106  if self.is_debug_motor_active != msg.data:
107  self.is_debug_motor_active = msg.data
108  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
109 
110  def __callback_program_is_running(self, msg):
111  if len(msg.status_list) == 0:
112  return
113  last_goal = msg.status_list[-1]
114  program_is_running = last_goal.status == last_goal.ACTIVE
115  if self.program_is_running != program_is_running:
116  self.program_is_running = program_is_running
117  # if not program_is_running:
118  # self.program_error = True if msg.last_execution_status == msg.EXECUTION_ERROR else False
119  # self.program_error_message = msg.last_execution_msg
120  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
121 
122  # Clean error after
123  self.program_error = False
124  self.program_error_message = ""
125 
126  def __callback_jog_is_enabled(self, msg):
127  if self.jog_is_enabled != msg.data:
128  self.jog_is_enabled = msg.data
129  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
130 
131  def __callback_hardware_status(self, msg):
132  rpi_overheating = msg.rpi_temperature >= self.rpi_overheating_temperature
133  # Clean up unused attributes to avoid unwanted callbacks due to their fluctuation.
134  msg.header = Header()
135  msg.rpi_temperature = 0
136  msg.temperatures = []
137  msg.voltages = []
138 
139  # Todo remove this
140  msg.error_message = ""
141 
142  if self.hardware_status != msg:
143  self.hardware_status = msg
144  self.rpi_overheating = rpi_overheating
145  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
146  elif rpi_overheating != self.rpi_overheating:
147  self.rpi_overheating = rpi_overheating
148  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_warning()
149 
150  def __callback_learning_mode_state(self, msg):
151  if self.learning_mode_state != msg.data:
152  self.learning_mode_state = msg.data
153  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
154 
155  def __callback_is_client_connected(self, msg):
156  if self.is_tcp_client_connected != msg.data:
157  self.is_tcp_client_connected = msg.data
158  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
159 
160  def __callback_collision_detected(self, msg):
161  self.collision_detected = msg.data
162  if self.collision_detected:
163  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
164 
165  def __callback_learning_trajectory(self, msg):
166  if self.learning_trajectory != msg.data:
167  self.learning_trajectory = msg.data
168  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
169 
170  def __callback_joint_states(self, msg):
171  if not self.joint_limits:
172  return
173 
174  current_out_of_bounds_state = False
175  # Add a small offset during limit checking to avoid flaky out of bound state
176  delta = 0.04 # Corresponds to about 2 deg which is the diff between hardware and software limits for the Ned3
177  if not self.hardware_status.calibration_in_progress and not self.hardware_status.calibration_needed:
178  for joint_name, joint_pose in zip(msg.name, msg.position):
179  if (joint_name in self.joint_limits and not (self.joint_limits[joint_name].min - delta <= joint_pose <=
180  self.joint_limits[joint_name].max + delta)):
181  current_out_of_bounds_state = True
182  break
183 
184  if self.out_of_bounds != current_out_of_bounds_state:
185  self.out_of_bounds = current_out_of_bounds_state
186  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_warning()
187 
188  def read_joint_limits(self):
189  tries = 0
190  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and tries < 10:
191  try:
192  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/get_joints_limit', timeout=5)
193  joint_limits_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/get_joints_limit', GetJointLimits)
194  self.joint_limits = {
195  joint_limit.name: joint_limit
196  for joint_limit in joint_limits_service.call().joint_limits
197  }
198  except rospy.ROSException:
199  rospy.logwarn("Waiting for '/niryo_robot_arm_commander/get_joints_limit' service")
200  tries += 1
